section.title: Congratulations
section.p: You have successfully generated and rendered an Apache Forrest site. This page is from the site template. It is found in src/documentation/content/xdocs/index.xml Please edit it and replace this text with content of your own.

section.title: Using examples as templates
section.p: This demo site has many examples. See the menu at the left. The sources for these examples are in the directory src/documentation/content/xdocs/
The sources for the Apache Forrest website are also included in your distribution at $FORREST_HOME/site-author/
You can also extend the functionality of Forrest via plugins, these will often come with more samples for you to out.
